import React from 'react'; import { FaInfoCircle, FaUsers, FaBullseye, FaPhoneAlt, FaFacebook, FaTwitter, FaInstagram, FaLinkedin } from 'react-icons/fa'; const AboutUs = () => { return (
{/* Title */}

About ARMS Portal

{/* What is ARMS */}

What is ARMS?

ARMS (Academic Resource Management System) is an all-in-one academic portal built to digitize and simplify the distribution and management of educational materials across universities. It empowers students, faculty, and administrators by providing structured access to essential academic resources in one centralized platform.

ARMS not only supports the academic journey of learners by organizing notes and exam content, but also enables educators to update and share resources instantly. With user-friendly interfaces and intuitive navigation, ARMS helps modernize how institutions manage learning assets and encourages collaborative academic growth.

  • 📘 Notes: Semester-wise categorized PDF notes uploaded by faculty and admins, ensuring students access the most accurate and relevant material for each subject.
  • 📚 Syllabus: Complete curriculum outlines for each course and semester, regularly updated to match academic reforms or regulatory changes.
  • 📝 Question Papers: Past year university question papers organized by course and subject to help students analyze patterns and prepare strategically.
  • 🔍 Search & Filter: Smart filtering and search features that allow users to quickly find resources by university, department, course, or semester.
  • 🌐 Multi-University Support: Institutions can manage their data independently under one shared platform, promoting resource sharing across campuses.
{/* Who Benefits */}

Who Benefits from ARMS?

Students

Access semester-wise study materials, stay updated with syllabi changes, and easily prepare for exams using categorized question banks.

Faculty

Simplify resource uploads, collaborate across departments, and maintain updated curriculum materials for students.

Admins

Easily manage university profiles, course structures, and monitor academic data across institutions from a single dashboard.

{/* Mission */}

Our Mission

Our goal is to make academic content universally accessible by bringing all university resources onto one intuitive, easy-to-use platform. We believe in empowering learners and educators through transparency, organization, and open knowledge-sharing.

{/* Contact Us + Social Media */}

Contact Us

Email: arms.portal@example.com

Phone: +91 12345 67890

Address: SPU University Campus, Mandi, Himachal Pradesh

{/* Social Icons */}

🌐 Follow us on Social Media

); }; export default AboutUs;
